name: Villager Trading Mayhem
description:
How To Play Trading

You can trade by interacting with villagers, by giving the items to the left you get the items in the right.

Equipping

You can equip yourself with weapons, this can vary from sticks to swords. Items you don't need can be dropped to villagers and they will automatically equip any weapon and armor that is better than what they currently have.

You can heal by eating food. Villagers can do this too at the beginning of every day.

Breeding

If a villager has a total amount of 10 calories of food in the inventory, they will breed. Creating a brand new villager.

Controls EInteractW, A, S, D, and arrow keysMovementScroll-WeelChange item in handLeft-clickAttackRight-clickUse itemQDrop
